import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBContainer, MDBBtn, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalFooter, } from "mdbreact"; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput } from "mdbreact"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { AddProductInApi } from "../../Action/ProductActions"; class ModalAddProduct extends Component { state = { Modalopen: false, first_name: "", last_name: "", password: "", user_name: "", email: "", post: "moderateur", }; toggle = () => { this.setState({ Modalopen: !this.state.Modalopen, }); }; render() { return ( this.state.Modalopen()} toggle={this.toggle()} fullHeight position="top" > Ajouter nouveaux Article
